title: 关于1.8命令方块
author: aizhi_D
txt_content: 求问，如何检测玩家抛出某个物品后，改变这个物品下方的方块为设定的方块，1.8的哟，指令只管打出来，我尽量看懂

replies.author: pineapple_
replies.txt_content:
scoreboard objectives add ground dummy
scoreboard players set @e ground 1 {Item:{id:"minecraft:wool",Damage:15s},OnGround:1b}
execute @e[score_ground_min=1] ~ ~ ~ setblock ~ ~-1 ~ diamond
扔黑色羊毛变钻石块

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
用/scoreboard tag给满足条件的掉落物(且已着地)设1分
然后/execute @e[score_xxx=1,score_xxx_min=1] ~ ~-1 ~ setblock....

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content: emmm...1.8没有tag。用scoreboard players add给满足条件的掉落物set 1分...
